title: Andre Galvao Jiu-Jitsu: Concepts, Details, Game Plan 5 DVD Set
description:
Galvao is one of the most dynamic and progressive BJJ and Submission Champion. Bred under the tutelage of two of the most progressive and accomplished BJJ'ers of modern times, Fernando "Terere" and Leozinho Vieira, Galvao has the perfect mix of solid moves and advanced techniques in this NEW DVD set to take your game to a new level.

Get ready to take your game to a new level. Master the basics and learn lethal moves. AndrÃƒÆ’Ã‚Â© Galvao demonstrates cutting-edge Concepts and focuses on the Details that make each technique efficient.You will learn the connection between the positions so you can perfect a whole new Game Plan.

Recognized as a Jiu-Jitsu phenomenon, AndrÃƒÆ’Ã‚Â© Galvao proved his excellence by winning multiple World titles. AndrÃƒÆ’Ã‚Â©' s clear teaching is a reflection of his unique Jiu-Jitsu, a combination of strong basics and the use of creative moves in an endless flow.

AndrÃƒÆ’Ã‚Â© reveals tournament-tested techniques that placed him on the Mundial and ADCC podiums. Learn the techniques that are effective at World class level and get ready to see the results.

DVD 1 THE STAND UP GAME

DVD 3 THE HALF GUARD
